markov - package markov
 
Markov - Class in markov
 
Markov() - Constructor for class markov.Markov
Creates a new Markov object ready to be trained with new text.
Markov(Matrix<String>) - Constructor for class markov.Markov
Creates a new Markov object with the specified Matrix.
Matrix<T> - Class in markov
 
Matrix() - Constructor for class markov.Matrix
Creates a new Matrix ready to be loaded with word pairs.
Matrix(Matrix<T>) - Constructor for class markov.Matrix
Creates a copy of the specified Matrix.
